subscribe

public Future<Boolean> subscribe(Set<com.barchart.feed.base.sub.Subscription> subs)
Description copied from interface: DDF_FeedClientBase
Handles multiple subscription requests.

If the client already has a subscription for any instrument of the set then this will overwrite it.

If called while the client is offline, registers the subscriptions and returns a future which immediately succeeds.

Specified by:
subscribe in interface com.barchart.feed.base.sub.SubscriptionHandler
Specified by:
subscribe in interface DDF_FeedClientBase
Returns:
A Future which returns true if successful.

Handles a subscription request.

If the client already has a subscription for the instrument then this will overwrite it.

If called while the client is offline, registers the subscription and returns a future which immediately succeeds.

public void setPolicy(DDF_FeedEvent event,

Description copied from interface: DDF_FeedClientBase
Sets the event policy for a specific feed event. Default policies are set by the constructor to handle disconnects and login success.
